title: Moderate: libgcrypt security update
description:
The libgcrypt library provides general-purpose implementations of various cryptographic algorithms.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2021-40528 is retrieved from Red Hat
